STI_DOC.P: Preparation of main design for heavy maintenance (Road Rehabilitation-Upgrading) of the state roads IB 14 and IB 33, section: Border of APV (Kovin) — Ralja — Pozarevac (Orljevo), L = 32 680 Km

CONTENTS.P: Selection was conducted through the Quality and Cost Based Selection (QCBS) method as stated under the relevant World Bank’s Guidelines: Selection and Employment of Consultants under IBRD Loans and IDA Credits & Grants by World Bank Borrowers issued in January 2011.
On 28.12.2016, Request for Proposal was sent to the following 6 consultants in accordance with the Consultants’ Short List approved by the European Investment Bank on 21.12.2016:
JV Project Biro Utiber doo, Serbia (JV leading partner)
JV CPS Ingenieros SL, Spain (JV leader)
JV Kerbs+Kiefer Eastern Europe GmbH, Germany (JV leader)
Geing Krebs und Kiefer International & others Limited, FYR Macedonia (JV partner)
JV Highway Institute JSC, Serbia (JV leader)
JV AIC Progetti SpA, Italy (JV leader)
The overall technical scores and scores assigned for each criterion and subcriterion to each consultant were the following:
01 JV CPS Ingenieros S.L. and Geoput d.o.o.
02 JV Project Biro UTIBER d.o.o., UTIBER Kozuti Beruhazo Kft. and PANPRO TEAM d.o.o.
03 JV NET Engineering S.p.A. and Hidroprojekatsaobracaj d.o.o.
04 JV Highway Institute JSC and Via Projekt d.o.o.
The prices offered by each Consultant as read out and as converted to currency of evaluation were as follows:
Consultants' names: JV CPS Ingenieros SL & Geoput doo
Conversion to currency of evaluation (RSD): Exchange rate(s): (2): 124 3319
Conversion to currency of evaluation (RSD): Proposals’ prices: (3) = (1) * (2): 29 093 664.60
Consultants' names: JV Project Biro Utiber doo & Utiber Limited & Panpro Team doo
Conversion to currency of evaluation (RSD): Exchange rate(s): (2): 1
Conversion to currency of evaluation (RSD): Proposals’ prices: (3) = (1) * (2): 36 075 864
Consultants' names: JV NET Engineering SpA & Hidroprojekat-saobracaj doo
Conversion to currency of evaluation (RSD): Exchange rate(s): (2): 124.3319
Conversion to currency of evaluation (RSD): Proposals’ prices: (3) = (1) * (2): 35 621 089.35
Consultants' names: JV Highway Institute JSC & Via Projekt doo
Conversion to currency of evaluation (RSD): Exchange rate(s): (2): 124.3319
Conversion to currency of evaluation (RSD): Proposals’ prices: (3) = (1) * (2): 31 628 419.05
Final rank of the Consultants was as follows:
Consultants’ names: JV CPS Ingenieros SL & Geoput doo
Consultants’ names: JV Project Biro Utiber doo & Utiber Limited & Panpro Team doo
Consultants’ names: JV NET Engineering SpA & Hidroprojekat-saobracaj doo
Consultants’ names: JV Highway Institute JSC & Via Projekt doo
Recommendation for the contract award went to the consultant with the highest combined technical and financial score.
Successful Consultant: JV NET Engineering SpA and Hidroprojekat-saobracaj doo

Scope of Contract: Consulting Services for Preparation of Main Design for Heavy Maintenance (Road Rehabilitation-Upgrading) of the State Roads IB 14 and IB 33, Section: Border of APV (Kovin) — Ralja — Pozarevac (Orljevo), L = 32 680 km
Implementing Agency: Public Enterprise “Roads of Serbia”, Belgrade, Republic of Serbia.
